email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Verify Your PayPal Account Now

Dear Valued PayPal Customer,

We regret to inform you that we have detected some suspicious activity on your PayPal account. In order to protect your account and prevent any unauthorized access, we kindly ask you to verify your account information immediately.

To complete the verification process, please click on the link below and follow the instructions provided. Failure to verify your account within 24 hours may result in the temporary suspension of your account.

Verify Your Account Now: [Phishing Link]

Please note that we take the security of your account very seriously and are committed to keeping your personal information safe. By verifying your account, you are helping us ensure the integrity of our platform and protect your funds from potential fraudsters.

Thank you for your cooperation and prompt attention to this matter. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team.

Sincerely,
PayPal Security Team
